sentences.en: A precision pressure regulator maintains the carrier - gas pressure constant.
sentences.cn: 精密压力调节器可以维持载汽压力恒定.

sentences.en: Abscisic acid is a important regulator in fruit development.
sentences.cn: 在果实发育过程中,脱落酸是一种重要的调节因子.

sentences.en: An auxiliary reacting regulator was added in the internal configuration.
sentences.cn: 对此,在原有内部回路组态上增设了1块辅助的反作用调节器.

sentences.en: An outer loop amplitude regulator is adopted to reduce the steady - state error.
sentences.cn: 另外,加入振幅调整外回路,以消除系统的稳态误差.

sentences.en: Application: Driver for solenoid and motor, series regulator and general purpose.
sentences.cn: 用途: 用于电机和螺线管的驱动, 调整器系列和一般用途.

sentences.en: His defense, which seems credible on the evidence so far, is that the bank masked its skullduggery so completely that no regulator anywhere in the world could get a handle on it.
sentences.cn: 他的辩词(根据目前证据似乎可信)是:银行把它的偷天换日的做法遮掩得天衣无逢,全世界任何地方的监管人员都无法掌握.

sentences.en: Insulin is a regulator of protein synthesis and breakdown.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素具有促进组织蛋白质合成,抑制蛋白质分解的作用.

sentences.en: It consist of high voltage generate system and voltage regulator system.
sentences.cn: 它一般由高压产生系统和电压调节系统两部分组成.

sentences.en: Manifolds: valve operation, safety, minimum pressure switch, pressure regulator and gas filter.
sentences.cn: 阀组包括: 操作阀, 安全阀, 最小压力开关, 压力调节器和燃气过滤器.

sentences.en: Plug the flow regulator into the wall and attach the nebulizer.
sentences.cn: 将气流调节器插头接通墙上电源,并连接喷雾器.

sentences.en: Purpose: DC - DC converter, low power switching regulator, high voltage application.
sentences.cn: 用途: 用于直流转换, 低功率开关电源, 高电压电路.

sentences.en: Remove the power window motor from the front door window regulator.
sentences.cn: 从前车窗调节器拆除电动窗马达.

sentences.en: The regulator was jerked from my mouth.
sentences.cn: 调节器陡然从我嘴里抽走.

sentences.en: This regulator does not require external energy, is a place - conditioning devices.
sentences.cn: 这种调节器不需要外来能源, 是一种就地调节的装置.

sentences.en: Using SCM and element make up of feedback network, buildup AC regulator.
sentences.cn: 再应用单片机和其他元件构成反馈控制网络, 组成了交流稳压器.

words.tran_cn: 调整；使有秩序；使合法化
调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理

phrases.tran_cn: 线性调节器；线性稳压器
开关式；交换调整器；开关式稳压器

trans.tran_cn: 校准者，[机]调整器，校准器，调节器，[化]调节剂，[无线]稳定器，调节基因，（钟表的）整时器，标准钟，管理者，调整者，整理者，原则，标准，[英史]选举调查[监视]委员，监管者
trans.tran_en: an instrument for controlling the temperature, speed etc of something
